description: 'This is a pummeling melee attack. Your attack inflicts 1 less point of damage than normal
column11: but dazes your target for one round
column12: during which time the difficulty of all tasks it performs is modified by one step to its detriment. Action.'

description: 'When you make an unarmed attack (such as a punch or kick)
column11: it counts as a medium weapon instead of a light weapon. Enabler'
